org.ardenus.ui

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.ui.Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.CharSequence

    public class Text
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.CharSequence
    Represents text that can be drawn to the screen.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

      • isBillboard

        public boolean isBillboard()
        Returns whether or not the text is a billboard. If the text is a billboard, it will be drawn based on the actual screen coordinates rather than the world coordinates.
        Returns:
        true if the text is a billboard, false otherwise.

      • setBillboard

        public void setBillboard(boolean billboard)
        Sets whether or not the text is a billboard.
        Parameters:
        billboard - true if the text should be a billboard, false otherwise.
